name: SubgraphNFTDescriptor
description: Describes subgraph NFT tokens via URI.

functionDecorators.name: tokenURI
functionDecorators.description: Produces the URI describing a particular token ID for a Subgraph. Note this URI may be data: URI with the JSON contents directly inlined.

parameterDecorators.name: _baseURI
parameterDecorators.description: The base URI that could be prefixed to the final URI.

parameterDecorators.name: _baseURI
parameterDecorators.description: The base URI that could be prefixed to the final URI.

parameterDecorators.name: _subgraphMetadata
parameterDecorators.description: Subgraph metadata set for the subgraph.

returnDecorators.description: The URI of the ERC721-compliant metadata.
